Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Like L 936, these ornaments were found in a beautiful tomb at Mirgissa/Iken. The reconstruction is modern. Along the row of twenty-seven conical beads made of black paste, there are nine neritic shells, cone or snail.
